testcase.name: Search for Hotel
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is traversed to Search Hotel page.................................passed Given user is on Search Hotel page..........................................passed When user selects "Melbourne", "1 - One", "13/01/2023", "14/01/2023", "1 - One".passed And user clicks on search button............................................passed And search results should be displayed......................................passed And user selects Hotel "radiobutton_1"......................................passed And user clicks on continue button..........................................passed And user selects details "Anjali", "Dhawan", "Test Address", "1122334455667788", "American Express", "December", "2022", "123".passed
